Title: FireworksCreator
Description: Application to edit and display fireworks-like particle system animations. Developed using Qt and C++.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Application to edit and display fireworks-like particle system animations. Developed using Qt and C++.

Short-term goal is to have a simple GUI editor working and to display the animation (only graphics, no sound). Longer-term goals are advanced editing features (including real-time preview), sound support, more advanced graphics effects. The application is developed in spare time so do not expect very fast progress.

Sorry but we don't have much time to develop this application, although there are plans about what features to include and how to implement it.

See wiki page InstallCompile for information about how to compile the source code.
